data.text: @MrHilariouskiwi Yep. Stay masked, isolated as much as possible and hope your colleagues and acquaintances do likewise. I’m very disappointed in some of my colleagues’ behaviour around infection control/personal safety. They’re very careful with patient contact, but less so with each other☹️😖
@iv_coffee_stat Thanks for sharing. No change in personal Covid safety behaviour expected for some time, sigh.

@MrHilariouskiwi Sadly no. Definitely not. More and more of my patients are positive on RAT every day. If every Practice is the same (& I’ll bet they are) then the numbers are growing not shrinking. ☹️Many are not being uploaded especially for kids <12, so they’re not in the “official” numbers.

@MrHilariouskiwi People won't be uploading their RATs 🤦‍♀️there will be so much more out there than we know...I'm running a register at work which records who has taken a box of tests and what the results are - also telling them to report any positives.
@Kid_Bristow Very possible however these groups would have never reported or tested anyway so the data will vary by that % regardless, over time.
@MrHilariouskiwi Rod Jackson thinks there isn't enough testing being done
